entry.title: Derby Originals Universal Vented Neoprene Non-Slip English Saddle Pad - Lightweight Breathable Design - Prevents Tack Slippage and Shifting while Riding
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: English Saddle Pads
Price: 12.99

Put an end to saddle slippage with this non-slip pure neoprene rubber pad. The neoprene rubber helps to grip your tack and assists in keeping everything securely in place. To use this non-slip pad, simply place it directly on your horse's back in the location where you would like the saddle to sit, then layer your saddle pad and other tack on top. This pad stays completely concealed while keeping all your tack in the perfect position to prevent any discomfort for both you and your horse. This pad is made from a lightweight neoprene rubber that is incredibly lightweight, can be easily cut to size so you can adjust the pad for your own personalized fit, and features ventilation holes to ensure airflow and increase comfort. Our pads are the best-selling non-slip pads on the market and are favored by professional horsemen!

 

Features

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE’S COMFORT IN MIND - tack slippage can cause irritation, soreness, and even become dangerous for both horse and rider. With our comfortable, soft, breathable pure neoprene non-slip saddle pad, tack slippage will become a thing of the past!

PREVENTS TACK MOVEMENT AND SLIPPAGE - our neoprene rubber pad grips your tack and holds it in place, preventing saddle pads, bareback pads, saddles, or another tack from shifting when you are riding.

UNIVERSAL FIT - this no-slip pad measures 17.5” by 21.5” to accommodate larger saddle pads and saddles, but can also be cut to size using a sharp knife or pair of scissors to fit smaller and contoured saddle pads or half pads. 

VENTILATED STAY-COOL DESIGN - our premium no-slip pad features a ventilated and breathable design that helps prevent excess sweating and keep your horse cool while it is in use.

LIGHTWEIGHT NON-BULKY DESIGN - this saddle pad is made from 3/16” neoprene that is thin enough to not add bulk or change the fit of your tack. Our ultra-thin non-slip pads are discreet and will not create bulging under your tack.

entry.summary:

Derby Originals Extra Comfort All Purpose English Saddle Pad with Removable Memory Foam

This all purpose saddle pad is designed to enable you to create a customized 
fit for your horse and tack equipment. The pockets are filled with removable memory foam to adjust to the shape of your tack and your horses back, providing comfort in sensitive areas. This pad is ideal for horses returning to work after a long period of rest and those who have sensitive areas that lie underneath the saddle. Equestrians can also use this for daily riding!

Key Features & Item Specifications:

  • Designed with circle quilted, heavy duty soft cotton twill fabric.
  • Two Velcro close pockets with removable memory foam inserts.
  • Velcro billet keepers and girth loops to prevent any tack from shifting.
  • Fits most all purpose and forward flap saddles.

  • Sizing: 
    • Spine Length: 23"
    • Drop Length: 20"
    • Width at widest point: 26"
 

Derby Originals Cotton Comfort All Purpose Saddle Pad.

Why Choose Derby?

Derby Originals caters to every equestrians needs by providing creative, innovative, and original equine products. Derby’s line of English saddle pads are meticulously tested and tried by elite equestrians to ensure they stand up to and meet every demand of both horse and rider. Our goal is to make certain that horse and rider are able to achieve ultimate comfort so that every riding session is a fantastic experience.

  • Derby Originals English saddle pads cater to the needs of every equestrian across all disciplines including every day riders and high end competitors.

Derby Originals Cotton Comfort All Purpose Saddle Pad

Embrace an Exceptional Fit

Provide your horse with soothing comfort with Derby Originals innovative all purpose English saddle pad with removable memory foam inserts. Designed with horse in mind, this pad will provide ultimate comfort in sensitive areas along the back and wither areas. This pad is ideal for horses returning to work after long periods of rest, those working to develop top line muscles, those with sensitive or 'cold' backs, and for everyday riding.

  • State of the art, shock absorbing memory foam.
  • Velcro billet keepers and girth loops.
  • Soft, durable, circle quilted pattern.
  • Velcro close pockets to hold memory foam for easy removal and adjustment.
  • Breathable spine.
View larger

Shock Absorbing Memory Foam

This pad features two removable memory foam inserts engineered to correct common complications that arise with traditional saddle pads. The sponge like characteristics of the memory foam form to the shape of the tack and horses back to provide the perfect amount of cushion where needed. Any impact and shock that occurs during riding is absorbed through the memory foam creating a smooth ride for both horse and rider.

Embrace an Exceptional Fit

This pad features with key design elements to ensure an exceptional fit. These features include Velcro billet keepers and girth loops to prevent the saddle pad from slipping underneath the tack, soft brushed cotton underside to provide gentle contact with the horse back, breathable spine to provide proper air flow, and cotton, circle quilted pattern material to ensure the pad can stand up to daily use.

Wide Array of Colors for Every Rider Prefence

This saddle pad not only delivers an exceptional fit, but style as well. Choose from one of our three colors to fit your style preferences. Available in aqua blue, black and white. New colors to come in fall of 2018!

Pocket for Trail Riding

The velcro closures on these pockets allow for quick access to your items and reduces the risk of injury from traditional metal or zipper closures.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: English Carry Bags & Covers
Price: 17.95

This saddle cover features a classic, attractive design while keeping your saddle safe and protected from dust and debris, wear, and damage. The stretchable, generous design allows it to fit almost any saddle.

  • ATTRACTIVE DESIGN - this high-quality saddle cover has a chic, classic English look to it and features our logo “Paris Tack: French Design” and the Eiffel tower embroidered in gold on the right-hand side.
  • PROTECTS YOUR SADDLE - this cover protects your saddle from dust and debris as well as from being scratched or otherwise damaged and is an attractive way to protect your saddle.
  • FLEECE LINED - this saddle cover is fleece lined to add extra cushion and protect your saddle during transport and storage.
  • MULTIPLE COLORS - this saddle cover is available in two colors, Black or Navy Blue.
  • FITS MOST SADDLES - this all-purpose cover is stretchable and sized generously and is designed to accommodate almost any all purpose English saddle. A separate design is available for dressage saddles.

entry.title: Dressage Saddle, Bridle, Boot and Garment Carry Bag Set of 4
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Saddle Carry Bags & Sets
Price: 124.95

Great for protecting and transporting show equipment. This 4 item set has a bag specially designed for every piece of your equipment and enough extra pockets for all your accessories. Rated as our Best Gift Set for Dressage Riders!
  • Durable, premium nylon outer shell
  • Inner padding and smooth nylon lining protect your tack while traveling
  • Saddle case unzips completely allowing for easy use
  • A terrific gift idea or for year end awards!

Included Components:
  • Premium Nylon Garment Bag
  • Premium Nylon, Padded Bridle Bag
  • Premium Nylon, Padded Tall Boot Bag
  • Premium Nylon, Padded Dressage Saddle Carry Bag

entry.title: Derby Originals All Purpose Diamond Quilted English Saddle Pad with Full Fleece Lining, Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: English Saddle Pads
Price: 39.95

Derby Originals All Purpose Diamond Quilted English Saddle Pad with Full Fleece Lining, Black

         This pad by Derby Originals is a classic quilted, top quality all purpose English saddle pad with high-density foam and full fleece lining along the underside for ultimate comfort. The high-density foam absorbs shock and provides relief at pressure points during riding, and the fleece lining provides gentle contact with your horse's coat and skin preventing rubs and sores. Utilize the Velcro billet keepers and girth loops to prevent tack from shifting and slipping. The dimensions of this saddle pad are 21” across the spine, and 28” drop length. The color and design enable this pad to be compatible for every equestrian.

Key Features & Item Specifications

ALL PURPOSE - not just for tails! This saddle pad is adored by all equestrians as a daily schooling pad as well.

 

GENEROUSLY SIZED - the dimensions of this English saddle pad make for a great fit. The spine is 21” across, and the drop length from the spine is 28” to the end of the pad.

TRADITIONAL LOOK - featuring a classic diamond-quilted patterned uniformed throughout the pad. This is a great schooling and show pad, available in black.

PREVENTS SHIFTING - velcro billet keepers and girth loops secure the pad to prevent the saddle pad from shifting underneath the tack.

EXTRA COMFORT - this English saddle pad has a full fleece lined underside for gentle contact with your horse’s back and is coupled with high-density foam for ultimate comfort and optimal airflow.
